org.gradoop.flink.util

Class FlinkAsciiGraphLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.util.FlinkAsciiGraphLoader

  • public class FlinkAsciiGraphLoader
extends Object
    Used the AsciiGraphLoader to generate instances of LogicalGraph and GraphCollection from GDL.
    See Also:
    GDL on GitHub

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FlinkAsciiGraphLoader(GradoopFlinkConfig config)
      Creates a new FlinkAsciiGraphLoader instance.

      • appendToDatabaseFromString

        public void appendToDatabaseFromString(String asciiGraph)
        Appends the given ASCII GDL String to the database. Variables previously used can be reused as their refer to the same objects.
        Parameters:
        asciiGraph - GDL string (must not be null)

        Returns:

      • getVertexByVariable

        public Vertex getVertexByVariable(String variable)
        Returns the vertex which is identified by the given variable. If the variable cannot be found, the method returns null.
        Parameters:
        variable - vertex variable
        Returns:
        vertex or null if variable is not used

        Returns:
